entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Despite hordes of Jabba's henchmen, you succeeded in configuring and testing the comm-interceptors on three comm-relay towers.
entries.journal_entry_description: One of the Azure Cabal's clients is interested in ongoing intel on Jabba the Hutt's activities. Spying on Jabba is chancy business; However, Loruna has given Porgryn a quantity of special comm-interceptors that self-destruct while forwarding a single, highly secure message. The benefit is that Jabba cannot trace the device back to the Cabal. The down side is that replacement of the units is an ongoing chore.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Attach a comm-interceptor to the northern-most comm-relay tower serving Jabba's Palace and wait for further instructions.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Attach a comm-interceptor to the northern tower. This is a tricky procedure, so clear the area first to prevent distractions.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Comm from Porgryn: "Good work. Stand by for encrypted test-signal. Do NOT leave the area or you may not be able to reset the destruct sequence in time. Estimated time to signal: 1 minute."
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: The comm-interceptor has received Porgryn's test message. Disable the destruct sequence within 2 minutes.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: The comm-interceptor has been successfully installed and tested. Return to Porgryn for your endorsement to Loruna.
entries.task08_comm_message_text: I have uploaded the test signal. You have 2 minutes to reset the self-destruct sequence.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Porgryn will send the test signal soon. Remain in the area and eliminate hostile forces in order to be ready when it comes.
entries.task11_comm_message_text: Good work. Stand by for encrypted test-signal. Do NOT leave the area or you may not be able to reset the destruct sequence in time. Estimated time to signal: 1 minute.
